title: Bioaccumulation and in vivo tracking of radiolabeled 4-nonylphenol in mice
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8578-8582
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08743C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sajid Mushtaq, Soyeon Kim, Iqra Bibi, Ji Ae Park, Ji-ung Yang, Hyun Park, Jung Young Kim
4-Nonylphenol, an emerging endocrine disruptor, raises health concerns. Radiolabeling and in vivo tracing of 4NP reveal significant tissue accumulation, emphasizing intricate distribution and potential long-term effects for risk assessments.
